data.name: The Farmer Was Replaced
data.detailed_description:
Program a drone using a simple visual programming language to fully automate various farming tasks that would otherwise be very grindy. Feel the satisfaction of simply pressing "execute" and watching your drone do all the hard work.


Farming earns you money which can be spent to unlock new technology.
Here's what the same program looks like after 2 speed upgrades:


So unlike most programming games the game isn't divided into distinct levels that you have to complete but features a continuous progression.
Programming is done by dragging and dropping commands for the drone into a behavior tree. The game will be easier for people who already have some programming experience but it can also be a good learning experience for beginners. The difficulty is dynamic in the way that coming up with better solutions will result in faster progress but everything can also be done in an easy and slow way.

data.short_description: Program a drone to automate a farm and watch it work at hyperspeed. Earn money to unlock better technology and become the most efficient farmer in the world. Improve your problem solving skills and train your brain to think in an algorithmic way.

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 550/equivalent or higher*
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: May run on weaker systems
